text: avarkalil oru kuttattinar (matinavacikalai nokki) ‘‘yasrip vacikale! (Etirikal mun) unkalal nirka mutiyatu. Atalal, ninkal tirumpic cenru vitunkal'' enru kuriyataiyum, avarkalil marroru pirivinar avarkalutaiya vitukal apayakaramana nilaimaiyil illamaliruntum ‘‘niccayamaka enkal vitukal apayakaramana nilaimaiyil irukkinrana'' enru kuri (yutta kalattiliruntu cenruvita nam) napiyitam anumati koriyataiyum ninaittup parunkal. Ivarkal (yuttattiliruntu) tappi otivituvatait tavira (veronraiyum) virumpavillai
